title: uLLak-kadavai
sahitya:
uLLak-kadavai tirandaruLa udayamAccudE en idaya deivamE


anupallavi

  kaLLa maDamai irulozhindadu kanaka mukhattaik-kATTi en manak-kavalaiyai OTTi


caraNam    ulagamellAm aruT-perum jyOti oLira nAn kaNDu kuLira kalagamillA 
Atma nEsam kalandu sirandu vaLara pala pala mada vAdamellAm paghal kaNDa 
paniyAga salasalatt-unadaruL vANi en sandak-kaviyil vandu pADavE
